function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased demand for new construction homes leading to more densely populated areas","Impact":"Higher risk of contagious disease spread due to increased concentration of people","Mitigation":"Implement strict sanitation measures and promote social distancing in new construction projects","Technologies":"Advanced HVAC systems, touchless fixtures, and environmental monitoring systems","People":"Homebuyers, construction workers, residents in the area","Owner":"Construction companies, local government, home builders"},{"Description":"Relocation from dense cities to suburbs","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases as people move to less dense areas","Mitigation":"Educate and promote sanitation practices in new suburban communities, ensure healthcare infrastructure is capable of handling increased population","Technologies":"Telemedicine, remote monitoring systems, and smart city technology for healthcare infrastructure","People":"Residents in cities, residents in suburbs, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Local government, healthcare providers, community organizations"}]}
